#!/usr/bin/env bash
phrase="The Time Now......, 
it's `date +'%l:%M %P'`"

/usr/bin/notify-send --icon=clock -t 40000 "Time Now" "<span color='#0000ff' font='46px'><i><b>$phrase</b></i></span>" >/dev/null 2>&1
/usr/bin/espeak "Waicky, waicky, hands of snaky. You just wasted one more hour of your life that you will never get back."
date >>.log
